Name: Bounty Hunter: Stampede
About the game: It's big game season, perch yourself atop a stampede of animals and pick off the best targets in this 'where's wally-esque' hidden object game. 64 animal variations make for a difficult hunt and you'll be timed before your trophy gets away so good luck and happy hunting! Features: 3 Modes: Easy - 400 animals Medium - 600 animals Hard - 800 animals Animals: 16 Different Animals with 4 variations each Dragons as priority targets VIP's There are 8 priority targets, hunt them down in hard mode as they randomly appear untracked Achievements: There's over 20 achievements to attain!
